Invocation Name: scott holroyd conversational marketer podcast
des:
Scott Holroyd is the creator of the Conversational Marketing System that is at the heart of his Books, Podcasts, Weekly YouTube Show, Monthly Business Real
Using these episodes will prepare you for real business in the real world from someone who has built a real business! Talking about everything from Funnel Hacking, Chatbots, AI, Social Media platforms, online and offline Marketing, Scott is the go to guy.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
